text: Edward E. Clark (born May 4, 1930) is an American lawyer and politician. He ran for Governor of California in 1978. He also ran for President of the United States as the nominee of the Libertarian Party in the 1980 presidential election. He was born in Middleborough, Massachusetts. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from California Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from California Category:1980 United States presidential candidates Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts
title: Ed Clark
